channel.title: Algorave on The B0ardside
channel.description: Recent content in Algorave on The B0ardside

item.title: BCPL Algos 1 & 2
item.description: Here’s a couple of new tracks I’ve put together using my Soundb0ard software..

item.title: Soundb0ard in use at Algosix
item.description: I’ve had my head down doing a bunch of work on my Soundb0ard software, in prep for playing at Algosix last weekend. The festival was awesome, so much great live music! I was quite happy with my performance, give it a listen/view:

item.title: TidalCycles Tutorials
item.description: Alex McLean’s TidalCycles has been a big influence on my own Soundb0ard, and lately, now that my instruments are mostly built, I’ve been looking for ways to algorithmically modify them more. This series of howto’s by Mike Hodnick/Kindohm have been an amazing source of inspiration - super clear and very entertaining - here’s the first episode:
